subject: Re: Is it possible to automatically run two complete sets of tests?
msgSnippet: Pat Rather than running your tests through the UI, run them directly in ANT that way you can easily run them twice and change the properties in between. The
messageBody:
Pat

Rather than running your tests through the UI, run them directly in
ANT that way you can easily run them twice and change the properties
in between. The only thing that you will need to worry about is to
make sure that your reports go to two different directories if you
plan one generating the HTML reports.

Janet
